Title: Ritika Mangla | Personal Webpage
Name: Ritika Mangla
Description: I am an engineering student studying Information Technology from V.J.T.I. Passionate about Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.
I am very ambitious and work hard towards making my dreams come true.
AboutContent: I am an Information Technology student who codes by day but is a performer at heart.
I have always loved the stage and know how to wear multiple hats.
I am a music aficionado and the days I seem to hit the wrong note, my guitar helps me harmonise.
If I can't explain myself well enough, I'll find a song that can.
WorkContent: I am currently full time Software Developer Engineer at Microsoft.

InternShips.name: Computer Vision Center, Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona
